data.title: NASA AM Application
data.desc: Application for additive manufacturing that converts PCB layouts to print path files of the STEP format. The software leverages CAD python libraries and a graphical user interface allowing users to configure desired PCB input parameters.

data.title: Front End Pokedéx
data.desc: A web application that displays a database of pokemon built with react. Pokemon information is sourced from API calls to an external database.

data.title: Back End Pokedéx
data.desc: A pokedex RESTful API that stores pokemon and trainer information in a relational database. Migrations are handled with liquibase and runs in a docker container. Users are authenticated with JWT.

data.title: Smart Home Project
data.desc: A system comprised of several digital devices synchronously operated by an android application. The HC-05 bluetooth module was used as a transmitter for connection between the circuit and the application.

data.title: Personal Website
data.desc: This website uses React and is deployed on AWS amplify.
